titleStmt.title: A copy of verses: presented to all my worthy masters and mistrisses in the town of Lambeth. By Thomas Ouldman, bell-man for that part of the parish.
titleStmt.author: Ouldman, Thomas.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for the author Thomas Ouldman,

notesStmt.note: Verse - "My masters all, I willing am to show,".
A collection of short verses on various themes.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
